5 import random
6 import env

8 import csv_interface
9 import numpy as np
10 from collections import deque
11 from keras.models import Sequential
12 from keras.layers import Dense
13 from keras.optimizers import Adam
14 from keras.models import model_from_json
15 import csv
16 
17 
18 def single_input():
19  states = range(30)
20  states = np.array(states)
21  print(states)
22 
23  q_table = csv_interface.readQTableFromCsv("Q_table.csv",(30,3))
24  print(q_table)
25 
26 
27  model = Sequential()
28  model.add(Dense(1,
29  input_dim=1, # 1D = nS
30  activation="relu"))
31  model.add(Dense(300, activation="relu"))
32  model.add(Dense(300, activation="relu"))
33  model.add(Dense(3,activation='selu'))
34  model.compile(loss="mse", optimizer=Adam(),metrics=['accuracy'])
35 
36  print(" ")
37 
38  print("Training with single input")
39 
40  model.fit(np.reshape(states,[30,1]),np.reshape(q_table,[30,3]),epochs=200 ,batch_size=4,verbose=2)
41 
42  print("Training done, resulting table and policy :")
43  policy = []
44  q_table=[]
45  for state in range(30):
46  state = np.reshape(state,[1,1])
47  q_values = model.predict(state)
48  print("S:{} Q:{}".format(state,q_values[0]))
49  policy.append(np.argmax(q_values[0]))
50  q_table.append(q_values)
51 
52  print(policy)
53 
54 def vector_input():
55  print(" ")
56  print(" ")
57  print(" ")
58  print("Training with vector input")
59 
60 
61  states = range(30)
62  states = np.array(states)
63  print(states)
64 
65  q_table = csv_interface.readQTableFromCsv("Q_table.csv",(30,3))
66  print(q_table)
67 
68  model2 = Sequential()
69  model2.add(Dense(24,
70  input_dim=30, # 1D = nS
71  activation="relu"))
72  model2.add(Dense(300, activation="relu"))
73  model2.add(Dense(300, activation="relu"))
74  model2.add(Dense(3,activation='selu'))
75  model2.compile(loss="mse", optimizer=Adam(),metrics=['accuracy'])
76 
77  state_matrix = np.zeros((30,30))
78  for state in states:
79  state_vector = np.zeros(30)
80  state_vector[state] = 1
81  state_matrix[state] = (state_vector)
82 
83 
84  state_matrix = np.reshape(state_matrix,[30,30])
85 
86  model2.fit(state_matrix,np.reshape(q_table,[30,3]),epochs=35 ,batch_size=4,verbose=2)
87 
88  print("Training done, resulting table and policy :")
89  policy = []
90  q_table=[]
91  for state in range(30):
92  state_vector = np.zeros(30)
93  state_vector[state] = 1
94  q_values = model2.predict(np.reshape(state_vector,[1,30]))
95  print("S:{} Q:{}".format(state,q_values[0]))
96  policy.append(np.argmax(q_values[0]))
97  q_table.append(q_values)
98 
99  print(policy)
